content.prompt: Major domestic developments in the United States during President Eisenhowerâ€™s two terms included all of the following EXCEPT

choices.label: a rise in the gross national product (GNP)
the dismantling of New Deal welfare programs

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
